mapper.select: select * from sys_role A where A.roleID = #{roleId} and A.PASSWORD = #{password}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_role (ID, ROLENAME, ROLEDESCRIPTION,ROLEPOWER,ROLESTATE) VALUES (#{roleId},#{roleName},#{roleDescription},#{rolePower},#{roleState})
